fields.name: Skill Description
fields.value:
• Pilgrims activate the <Sacred Healing> skill with every 1 basic attack
• The skill __restores lost health__ of all friendly units within range.
• Healing: 45 / 50 / 55 / 65 / 80 / 100 / 125 / 150 / 263

fields.name: Main Uses
fields.value:
• Pilgrims are essential in Honor Hunting. Typically 2-3 Pilgrims are recommanded.
• Pilgrims are sometimes used as back-row defenders.
